text: Kaha aey meri qom! Dekho to agar mein apney rab ki taraf say roshan daleel liye huye hon aur uss ney mujhay apney pass say behtareen rozi dey rakhi hai mera yeh irada bilkul nahi kay tumhara khilaf ker kay khud uss cheez ki taraf jhuk jaon jiss say tmhen rok raha hun meri irada to apni taqat bhar islaah kerney ka hi hai. Meri tofiq Allah hi ki madad say hai ussi per mera bharosa hai aur ussi ki taraf mein rujoo kerta hun
